title: Options Schema
description: Schema for options.json files containing unit/model customization options

Type.description: Type of option - determines how it affects units/models (0=UnitGlobalChange, 1=UnitSwapDisplayable, 2=UnitBasicSwapDisplayable, 3=UnitProfileChange, 4=ModelSwapDisplayable, 5=ModelSwap, 6=ModelAdd)

DisplayableDataIdToAdd.description: Object mapping displayable data IDs to add (statlines, rules, equipment)
